title: Two Whats?! And A Wow! - Word is the Word (9/9/22)
description:
Why are Mindy and Guy Raz sorting their fan mail, and what does it have to do with language? We've got the WHATs and the WOWs about words, and it's up to you to guess the winning WOW!
